name: ZombieTime
description:
Made for the One Game a Month game jam. The theme was Time is Key. 

A third person puzzle adventure game where you play as a wizard who can manipulate the flow of time. Use your time powers to overcome hungry zombies and spooky catacombs.

Team

Game design: Danny Colclough

3D Modeling: Brandon-Lee Coskey, Christan Besseling

Music & SFX: Brandon-Lee Coskey, Roxanne Coskey

Programming: Brandon-Lee Coskey

Assets from the Unity asset store
  • Pause Menu: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/open-source-pause-menu-59478
  • Skyboxes: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/galaxybox-1-0-18289
  • Zombie Animations: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/zombie-animation-pack-free-1...
  • Caves: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/small-cave-kit-49372
